pr_title: [CDAP-16571] Add empty indicator for plugin selector

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to add a default here for opt.disabled?
timeline.author: yukiej

replies.bodyText: no, if it's falsy it won't disable it
replies.author: elfenheart

timeline.bodyText:
nit: I think it should be plural, i.e. "no {extension} plugins"
Also, i18n?
timeline.author: yukiej

timeline.message: [CDAP-16571] Add empty indicator for plugin selector
